title: Room Available For Female To Keep Me Company Rent Free
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Looking for a young female to keep me company during lockdown 

Free accommodation!! No rent fees to pay!! 

Unfortunately i own a gym and will be shut due to lockdown rules for a long period 

Looking for a female to live with me for a while to keep me company, watching movies, cooking or just chilling out

In exchange you will be given a free property to live and eat in rent free

Covid test will need to be taken before living with myself 

Please send me a photo and message if interested
